# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug457.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug457.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug457.cir.prn.gs.pl ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug457.cir.prn.gs.pl ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug457.cir.prn.gs.pl PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_457_SON/bug457.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> bug457.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_457_SON/bug457.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;bug457")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_457_SON/bug457.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug457.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_457_SON/bug457.cir.gen_gs COMMAND perl bug457.cir.prn.gs.pl bug457.cir.prn)
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_457_SON/bug457.cir.gen_gs PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED bug457.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_457_SON/bug457.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug457.cir bug457.cir.prn.gs bug457.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_457_SON/bug457.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED bug457.cir)
endif()
